Control.Text: If you don't want messages of a channel to show up in the stock chat window, disable them in the stock chat options and it will only show in WSIM.
Control.Name: Description

Control.Text: Shift + Click the button to show all new messages.
Control.Name: Description

Control.Text: Shows a preview of the message when a whisper is recieved.
Control.Name: Description

Control.Text: Shift + Click on the corresponding option to show the chat window. To open a new whisper window, simply whisper someone in the stock chat window and a new window will show. This works even if you have whispers disabled in the stock chat window.
Control.Name: Description
NewProfile
Control.Tooltip: To create a new profile, type the desired name into the input box and press return.

Control.Name: Current
Control.Tooltip: Here you can select which profile you would like to use.

Control.Name: Copy
Control.Tooltip: Here you can import the settings from another profile into your current one.

Control.Name: Delete
Control.Tooltip: If you do not want a certain profile anymore you can delete it here.
